column5: husband wants to go in june 06 any info would be helpfull. he wants a guide for a couple of days do you know of any been to temple bay a couple of times loved the shore lunch.. any fishing info will help thanks jessica

[font color=green size=3][b]I have a cottage on Wabaskang, and know the alot of the locals. Tommy Williams at www.sleepydogcabins.com not only has a nice camp, but in the past he, or his nephew who have both lived there all there lives have done guiding. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby

check out tall pines camp at www.tallpinescamp.com it is a very nice camp with great fishing close to it.steve and andrea have owned it for 2 years now and are doing a great job of making your stay a good one.steve guides and knows the lake system quite well.
